fullText: Jake Gyllenhaal and Ruth Wilson bring star power and serious acting chops to Nick Payne's romantic drama about parallel universes and the infinite possibilities of love.
dtliExcerpt: Jake Gyllenhaal and Ruth Wilson bring star power and serious acting chops to Nick Payne's romantic drama about parallel universes and the infinite possibilities of love.
